markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Evade Doom](/Feats.aspx?ID=5558) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Catfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=746" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 11 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You can elude supernatural disaster. When you would gain the [doomed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=67) condition, you can attempt a DC 17 flat check. On a success, you don't gain the doomed condition.

<title level="2">Evade Doom leads to...</title>
[Ten Lives](/Feats.aspx?ID=5567)
name: Evade Doom
